posts.post_content:
Bumped to price individually.

PayPal OK.  First to email. Prices include delivery. 

Abbaticchio - no creases, light wrinkling in lower right on the border. SOLD
Sweeney - light vertical crease down the center, hard to see on front. $23
Brashear - no creases, paper loss in lower right on front. $20
Pelty - no creases, very nice card. SOLD
Chappelle - no creases, light chipping on front. SOLD
Stark - horizontal crease in the middle, shows more on back than front. SOLD

Mark
